description: This is a little space shooter arcade game for one player. It aims to be an 'old school' arcade game. It is a top-down scroll action game with energy based game play and multiple weapons with several power levels.  There are multiple enemies with different attack straggles as well as a final stage boss. The free version of the game has 2 stages with shortened game play.  ***New Controls***  In Game: Accelerometer or Keyboard Based, with screen tap to fire.  Menu Controls: Touch menu choice you would like to select. It will highlight then will direct you to the you menu choice you have selected. Use back swipe to go to previous menu. In Game Control specifics:Tilt to move ship, hold phone at ~25deg tilt away from you to move up the screen tilt towards you to move down the screen or  left "E",  right "X",  forward "F",  backwards "D" Tapping the screen during game play will fire your weapon. To pause either Press "P" or put game into card mode. To unpause press "P" or tap screen.  If you have more questions about controls or the game please visit http://trilli.dyndns.org/DD2/   Feed back is welcome this is my first attempt at a game, I will take your suggestions and try to incorporate them. Thanks for all the positive and helpful input! *****currently working on: performance issues,  and other features.
